name: The Princess And the Shapeshifter
description:
This is a story about someone with very special powers who is on a quest to save a Princess. It was entirely created in about 3 weeks for the FAtiMA Jam (FAtiMA is a system for creating characters whose dialogue is based on AI).

BUG NOTES: Dialogue options sometimes take a few seconds to appear. Don't press the button before they appear, because then the game will instantly pick an option without you being able to read it!

Also, Salta-Pocinhas will randomly get your character's name wrong.

Everything was created by us, unless otherwise listed below!

Artwork, Design, Writing & Programming:

Pedro Cabral (aka Petzi)

Matilde Gonçalves

FAtiMA Toolkit 2D Unity Platform Engine by Sebastian Lague Music:

"Village of the Peeping Frogs" by Visager

"Tuvastarr" by stacxk

Tools:

Unity

MediBang Paint

Krita

Gimp
